title: How to Draw a Bus

steps.headline: Add 2 circles below for the bus tires.
steps.description: Next, add small rectangular shapes inside the big rectangle as windows. Place them on the upper area.

steps.headline: Make a straight outline on your sketches.
Color it.
steps.description: Pick a different color for the window.

steps.headline: Add small details.
steps.description: Add lines for the bus light and door lock, depending on your preferences.

text: Create a rounded rectangular shape.  Add 2 circles below for the bus tires. Next, add small rectangular shapes inside the big rectangle as windows. Place them on the upper area. Make a straight outline on your sketches. Erase the guidelines. Color it. Pick a different color for the window. Add small details. Add lines for the bus light and door lock, depending on your preferences.
